thread.section_title: Livewire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Livewire | www.getlivewire.com
thread.title: Billy Burleson

author: Billy Burleson
title: Billy Burleson
text: This Saturday morning we had Livewire wall mount and install 2 large TV's. They also hooked up a smaller 3rd TV. For our ease of use they also hooked up the components on the biggest TV so we can use one remote for everything. The 2 Livewire employees who did the work were Greg & Dustin. They were here at the scheduled time, did all the work, and took time to explain operating instructions as some things were new to us. They were most helpful and did clean up inside before they left. I would definitely recommend Livewire to others and specifically recommend Greg and Dustin. In addition Marshall was helpful in phone conversations we had before the installation was done.
